response.answer_text: First of all wish a very good luck if you are interested in STENOGHRAPY, and i am very glad to share information about STENO. STENOGHRAPY has it's own symbols called 24 consonants, 12 vowels and 4 diphthongs. Now Scope: Generally it is used for many office works for making notices and application and so other works both in private sector as well as in govt sector.
